name: Santa Slam
description:
CONTROLS:

Left click:   Shoot present
Right click:   Melee sack
WASD:   Movement



HOW TO PLAY:

Clear out every house of its robbers. Once all robbers are defeated, a red arrow will appear above the Christmas tree.  Then, touch the Christmas tree to go to the next level. Every odd level (Except level 1) Will give you a choice between 2 upgrades. These will permanently give you an upgrade for the rest of the playthrough.
